title: Scroll position is lost when navigating back to Newsfeed / Discovery feed (Android)
description:
<!---
Please read this!

Before opening a new issue, make sure to search for keywords in the issues
filtered by the "T - Bug" label and verify the issue you're about to submit isn't a duplicate.
--->

### Summary

On the Android app, the user loses previous scroll position when navigating from (e.g.) Newsfeed > Notifications > Newsfeed. 

This was reported by a user, and I independently verified.

[User report](https://www.minds.com/newsfeed/1359129081672634373)

### Steps to reproduce

- Launch the Minds app, logged in
- Navigate to the Newsfeed. Scroll down.
- Navigate to the Notifications screen.
- Navigate back to the Newsfeed.

### Platform information 

I tested on a Sony Xperia 10, Android 10, with the latest build from the Play Store.

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

- When returning to the Newsfeed, your previous scroll position is lost -- you will see the top of the Newsfeed.

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

- When returning to the Newsfeed, your previous scroll position should be remembered -- you can continue scrolling the feed where you left off.

title: Let users hide channel recommendations from the Newsfeed
description:
Our new in-feed channel recommendations is showing positive results for driving new channel subscriptions. Some users, however, have expressed wanting the ability to remove it.

We should add the option for users to temporarily hide in-feed channel recommendations from the Newsfeed.

## Acceptance

- [ ] When a user encounters in-feed channel recommendations on the Newsfeed, they have an interface that lets them choose to hide the component.
- [ ] If the user chooses to hide the component, the component disappears from the screen.
- [ ] Every time the user visits the Newsfeed, the in-feed channel recommendations component does not appear.
- [ ] If the user chooses to hide in-feed channel recommendations on the Newsfeed, this DOES NOT impact their appearance in other contexts such as when it appears after tapping the subscribe button.

## Design notes

**Designs to follow**

See same web task here -> https://gitlab.com/minds/minds/-/issues/3030

- Designs -> https://www.figma.com/proto/iFtbrfoK1BUvybYMHgFHuX/Recommendations-%5BMobile%5D?page-id=0%3A1&node-id=2%3A2&viewport=369%2C48%2C0.7&scaling=scale-down&starting-point-node-id=2%3A2

title: Define how to integrate codepush updates into our workflow & CI
description:
### Summary

We need to define how are we going to integrate the code push support into our work/deployment workflow.

- [ ] When a new release should be submitted to the app stores
- [ ] When a new build should be submitted to come-push 
- [ ] How we can use the Staging env to improve our mobile QA flow
- [ ] CI integration

title: Mobile should support new friendly captcha
description:
## Goal

Following frontend/backend implementation (https://gitlab.com/minds/front/-/merge_requests/1851) of Friendly Captcha, mobile needs to also support

## What needs to be done

Implement the Friendly Captcha JS component under an experiment flag.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Implement using a feature flag
- [ ] Ensure any QA captcha overrides are still working

title: Channel Bio is not saved when added via Setup Channel
description:
### Summary

Channel Bio is not getting saved via Setup Channel Onboarding Panel. 

### Steps to reproduce

1. Open minds app.
2. Login successfully.
3. Navigate to earn tokens option.
4. Select Channel. 
5. Add Bio to Channel.
6. Hit Save. 
7. Open Setup Channel panel again. 
8. Notice that the bio is not saved.

### Platform information 

v4.23 - iPhone 11 Pro

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

Bio is not getting saved.

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

Bio should automatically get saved.

### Relevant logs and/or screenshots
![BioSaved](/uploads/3da1d506ad51260ff77053151f7f9612/BioSaved.mov)

title: Refresh Discovery tab when tapping navigation button
description:
## Acceptance
- Given the user is already on the Discovery screen,
- when the user taps the Discovery button in the navigation (Search icon),
- then the screen scrolls to the top and the feed is refreshed.

----

This is a feature request to auto-refresh when tapped on Home Icon (Latest & Top posts), Discovery Icon and Minds+ feeds.

Adding @markryansallee and @msantang78 for more details.

title: NSFW Image is visible via View Image option
description:
### Summary

NSFW post with image is visible when View image option is selected from the menu.

### Steps to reproduce

1. Open minds app and login.
2. Create a Post with image and mark NSFW.
3. Now go to that post and select the dropdown menu.
4. Choose View Image. 
5. Notice that NSFW image is still visible on mobile. 

### Platform information 

v4.23 - iPhone 11 Pro

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

NSFW image can be viewed when should be blocked. 

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

NSFW image should be blocked.

### Relevant logs and/or screenshots

![NSFWStillVisible](/uploads/0db46baefcd3bb67ded08a7148ce6b0e/NSFWStillVisible.mov)

title: 2FA Resend button is not actionable and incorrectly highlighted
description:
### Summary

The resend button on 2FA screen when tapped, highlights the full line instead of just the "Resend code" button. View attached video.

### Steps to reproduce

1. Open minds app. 
2. Perform a change so 2FA screen appears.
3. Notice that the Resend code button does not do anything if it was pressed recently and the full line is highlighted instead of highlighting only the Resend code button. Download video attached. 

### Platform information 

v4.23 - iPhone 11 Pro

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

Resend button not actionable and highlights full text line on press. 

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

Resend button should work successfully and only highlight "Resend code" button.

### Relevant logs and/or screenshots

![2FA](/uploads/b56571b5f6fafbc9e0548e5e0131e81e/2FA.mov)

title: Tapping on Revoke Boost button does not do anything and continues to display
description:
### Summary

Notice that when you have a boost and you tap on Revoke button, it does not do anything. It only updates when the page is refreshed. 

### Steps to reproduce

1. Open minds app.
2. Login to your profile. 
3. Create a post and boost it. 
4. Go to Settings -> Boost. 
5. Select that post and tap revoke. 
6. Nothing happens. Tap again revoke. Nothing happens. 

Post has been revoked but user doesnt know until the page is refreshed as the revoke button is still available. 

### Platform information 

v4.23 - iPhone 11 Pro

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

Revoke button is still available and not removed after a successful revoke. 

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

Revoke button should not be available anymore when post is already revoked. A toast message must display ideally to inform the user. 

### Relevant logs and/or screenshots

![RevokeButton](/uploads/cce70ce7635e172611ec7c00ef417dab/RevokeButton.mov)

title: Tapping on reward tokens notification does not do anything and displays double toast message
description:
### Summary

Daily reward notifications do not take you to reward page as expected. 

### Steps to reproduce

1. Open minds app.
2. Use the app so you can earn daily reward tokens.
3. Wait for the tokens notification next day. 
4. Tap on the notification within minds app for rewards earned.
5. Notice that tapping on the notification does nothing and only displays two duplicate notifications. 

### Platform information 

iPhone 11 Pro - v4.23

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

Rewards notification does not take you to correct page. 

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

Rewards notification should take to correct page and also not show duplicate toast message twice. 

### Relevant logs and/or screenshots

![Tokens_Bug](/uploads/b4e5c78dd941d6df4de576a1118fb141/Tokens_Bug.mov)

title: Saving Tags under Manage Tags briefly makes all tags disappear
description:

### Steps to reproduce

2. Navigate to Minds+.
3. Navigate to Trending.

5. Hit Save button. 

### Platform information

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

### Relevant logs and/or screenshots

title: Share to Minds is not working for Videos
description:
### Summary

As a user, I cannot share video as a post via Share to Minds feature. 

### Steps to reproduce

1. Open minds app.
2. Login successfully.
3. Navigate to Gallery. 
4. Select a Video and choose share option. 
5. Notice that the Minds app is not displayed when sharing a video but it displays when sharing an image. See screenshot.

iPhone 11 Pro - v4.23

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

Minds app is not shown as an option when sharing a video.

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

title: Changing password within the app when your current password is incorrect throws wrong error message
description:
### Summary

When a user changes the password within the application and enters wrong current password, it throws "Insecure password" error instead of saying "Incorrect password".

### Steps to reproduce

1. Open minds app. 
2. Login successfully. 
3. Navigate to Settings -> Change password. 
4. Enter wrong password as current password, and new passwords.
5. Hit save.
6. Notice the error message is not correct. 

### Platform information 

iPhone 11 Pro - v4.23

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

Error message says Insecure. 

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

Error message should say Incorrect so it is clear to end user. 

### Relevant logs and/or screenshots

![image](/uploads/3818939f9f42cbc512a0500cfcb2a4e2/image.png)

### Steps to reproduce

2. Navigate to Settings.

title: Changing password within the app still keeps the user on same screen
description:

When a user successfully changes the password, user is not navigated to outside the change password page but instead is on same screen again with all empty fields. 

### Steps to reproduce

2. Navigate to Settings -> Change Password.
3. Change the password successfully. 
4. Hit Save, Toaster appears but user is still on same page. 

### Platform information 

v4.23 - iPhone 11 Pro

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

User is still on Change Password page with all empty fields. 

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

Device should logout and delete all local tokens after password change. 

### Relevant logs and/or screenshots

![image](/uploads/267926317309b22243b1f8316eb4a290/image.png)

title: No error message when you tap "Confirm" on empty Phone Confirmation Code
description:
### Summary

No error message is show when you tap on Confirm on a Phone Confirmation screen with empty code. It should either block the Confirm button from being pressed or throw an error when code is empty.

### Steps to reproduce

1. Open Minds app.
2. Navigate to a phone confirmation screen as in screenshot.
3. Enter no code.
4. Tap Confirm. Nothing happens. Continues to stay on page with no error. 

### Platform information 

v4.23 - iPhone 11 Pro

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

No error appears.

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

Error message should appear or Confirm button should be disabled. 

### Relevant logs and/or screenshots

![image](/uploads/a9cdf686478a4b47e4af3b691098013c/image.png)

title: User is allowed to verify email when already verified
description:
### Summary

After registration, if a user has already verified email, he/she can still open it and tapping on "Resend verification email" throws an error. 

### Steps to reproduce

1. Open minds app.
2. Login with a user who has already verified email.
3. Tap on Complete to earn tokens.
4. Tap on Verify email strikethrough option.
5. Notice that you can tap on Resend verification email and that throws an error. 

### Platform information 

iPhone 11 Pro - v4.23

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

User is allowed to request new email verification code even when his/her user is already verified. 

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

This behavior should be blocked as in web or a proper error message should appear that clarifies this that email is already verified as in web. 

### Relevant logs and/or screenshots
![OnboardingVerifyEmail](/uploads/5ded874001d4b0f4d90ee2dea73b2195/OnboardingVerifyEmail.mov)

title: Cannot Hit Save button on Setup Channel Onboarding page
description:
### Summary

When on Setup Channel Onboarding page, user cannot hit save when on Bio field. 
"Done" button sends us to next line and Save button is not visible. Updated Bio cannot be saved. 

### Steps to reproduce

1. Open Minds app.
2. Register as a new user.
3. Hit Complete to Earn tokens.
4. Choose Setup Channel.
5. Notice that when inside the fields, save button cannot be pressed. See video attached. 

### Platform information 

iPhone 11 Pro - v4.23

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

Save button not visible. Done button doesnt help as only adds a new line.

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

User should be able to update the fields. 

### Relevant logs and/or screenshots
![CannotCloseKeyboard](/uploads/9a40547529f737804a1ca3ab66c29bb9/CannotCloseKeyboard.mov)

title: Rate limit error when using forgot your password feature
description:
### Summary

Using a valid channel name, but since due to rate limit error, token is not sent for forgot your password. 

### Steps to reproduce

1. Open minds app. 
2. Navigate to forgot your password.
3. Enter a channel name and tap Continue.
4. Re-request forgot your password multiple times.
5. Notice that the rate limit error appears. 

### Platform information 
iPhone 11 Pro - v4.23

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

Rate limit error appears. 

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

Instead, UI should not allow user to re-request token until a certain time limit has passed.

### Relevant logs and/or screenshots

See comment video. Might need to download to view.

Attached as comment. Might need to download.

title: Cannot Delete a Post first time on iOS & Android
description:
### Summary
On mobile app, a post is not being deleted successfully the first time after a clean install. 

### Steps to reproduce

1. Download & Open Minds app. 
2. Login successfully.
3. Create a new post from Home page. 
4. On that new post, tap the Delete menu option from dropdown.
5. Notice that the post still remains.

### Platform information

iOS & Android all devices - v4.23

### App version

v4.23

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

Post deleting does nothing.

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

Post should be deleted successfully.

title: Auth token refresh logic
description:
### Summary

A possible bug in the token refresh logic can be the culprit of the empty screens and load issues that Bill is reporting.

We need to verify and test the logic against a sandbox with a reduced token TTL.

Related to #4188

title: Edit option always shown for posts
description:
### Summary

The edit option is always available, even if you are not the owner of the post

### Steps to reproduce

Open post's menu

### Platform information 

Both

title: Horizontal transition for modals
description:
### Summary

Wrong transition for modals

![Screen_Recording_2022-04-04_at_09.16.39](/uploads/4f7957fad944c370de815cf6d89324ca/Screen_Recording_2022-04-04_at_09.16.39.mov)

iOS, Android

Opens from the left

it should animate from the bottom to the top
and be closed by swiping down from the header

title: Add unverified email toaster
description:
### Summary

Some actions are not showing the proper message when the server responds with an unverified error
 - Comments
 - Subscribe

The composer is working properly, we should create a global handler for this error and always display the toaster

title: Prompt user to 'see latest posts' on the newsfeed (app)
description:
When a user is scrolling through their feed, it may be that new content is available. However, currently the app neither polls or notifies the user when there is new content to view.

Please see design here -> https://www.sketch.com/s/0c0b6cff-4a1a-4adf-8899-359668617f9d/a/d9eyv2

## Acceptance criteria

- Poll for content every 30 seconds if on a 'latest' feed
- Display the see latest content hover tag
- The api endpoint should use a _count query for efficiency
- Do not poll when the browser is inactive
- Introduce as an experiment with id `front-4089-polling`
- Use GTE>= last search query time
- Badge/ticket to read "See X new posts"
- In the context of newsfeed, ensure we don't scroll to the boost rotator, but below it

title: Video transcoding
description:
## Goal

This is related to #4124 and #4125 

In order to speed up the video upload, we should reduce the resolution locally before uploading it to the server.
This will not only reduce the upload time but also the transcoding time on the backend

https://github.com/tanersener/ffmpeg-kit seems to be the best alternative for this.


## What needs to be done

 - Install https://github.com/tanersener/ffmpeg-kit for both platforms
 - Implement video transcoding as a previous step of the upload
   - Transcode video to 1080p and only if the resolution is bigger than that

## QA

<!---
Consideration is given to how the issue will be demoed and tested prior to being deployed
--->


## UX/Design
-


## Personas

This will improve the UX while submitting videos to the platform, reducing the time to upload the videos to the server

## Experiments

-


## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] The videos must be transcoded to 1080p for videos with a higher resolution
- [ ] The videos must be uploaded if the resolution is lowe than 1080p

## Definition of Ready Checklist

- [ ] Definition Of Done (DoD)
- [ ] Acceptance criteria
- [ ] Weighted
- [ ] QA
- [ ] UX/Design
- [ ] Personas
- [ ] Experiments

title: Portrait feed not loading

title: Discovery Navigation: hashtags navigate back
description:
on discovery screen -> search for a hashtag -> tap on a hashtag in a post in the search results =>

what happens: navigation goes back and does nothing

title: Update vision camera package to add support to pause/resume video recording
description:
### Summary

A new version of the vision camera package has been released and it adds support to pause and resume video recordings.

@jotto141 asked for this feature a long time ago.

 - [x] Udate the package
 - [x] Adapt the UI to pause/resume video recordings

title: Token should be uppercase in the Minds+ upgrade modal
Disable plus/pro subscription screen for iOS
description:
### Summary

There are many ways to open this screen. (even tapping a minds+ post)

- [x] Disable this screen and show a message on iOS
- [x] Remove the pro/plus link on the settings, wallet->tokens->earning and menu->earnings

Instead of the `IS_IOS` constant use a `PRO_PLUS_SUBSCRIPTION_ENABLED` to make it easier to enable or clean up the changes in the future



(If you can, link to the line of code that might be responsible for the problem)

title: Remove membership tiers & minds+/pro from iOS
description:
### Summary

Remove from iOS
 - [ ] membership tier subscriptions

title: (chore) Rename "incorrect password" during registration
description:
Some users get confused when seeing the message "Incorrect password" error when registering for a new account.

Mobile app:

![image](/uploads/645d1b00d7264f0794caa8501ea4af27/image.png)

Web app:

![image](/uploads/f20622e3ff0117ecedc053532ec80457/image.png)

## Solution

Use the term `Insecure password` instead.

title: Deep-link for comment reply push notification doesn't work
description:
<!---
Please read this!

Before opening a new issue, make sure to search for keywords in the issues
filtered by the "T - Bug" label and verify the issue you're about to submit isn't a duplicate.
--->

### Summary

- Given I'm on a mobile device,
- and I have the mobile app installed,
- and I receive a push notification for a comment / reply,
- when I tap the push notification,
- then the Minds app launches,
- and I see the last screen I visited within the app.

### Steps to reproduce

Follow steps above.

### Platform information 

iOS 15.3.x, iPhone 12 Mini, latest Test Flight build

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

Tapping the notification launches the app, but does NOT navigate me to the relevant reply / conversation.

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

Tapping the notification launches the app, and DOES navigate me to the relevant reply / conversation.

title: Un-joined Groups posts bleeding into feeds
description:
<!---
Please read this!

Before opening a new issue, make sure to search for keywords in the issues
filtered by the "T - Bug" label and verify the issue you're about to submit isn't a duplicate.
--->

### Summary

Some users have reported that they see posts from Groups they're not members of appearing in their Newsfeeds.

[First reported in a comment here](https://gitlab.com/minds/minds/-/issues/2886#note_846543988).

### Steps to reproduce

- Create an image post in a group from the iOS app.

### Platform information 

- "Bleeding" posts created on iOS app
- Newsfeed with posts observed on web app

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

- Posts appear in the Newsfeed from Groups that the user is not a member of

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

- Posts from Groups the user is not a member of do not appear in Newsfeeds
- Posts from Groups the user IS a member of can appear in Newsfeeds (this is an ongoing experiment)

### Relevant logs and/or screenshots

Screenshot below is from `@bashynx`, who (at the time of this recording) subscribed to me (`@mellamomrs`) but was not a member of the Apertures Anonymous group.

![image](/uploads/bc2057b342d03cb86cbc6d7ead766427/image.png)

4. Notice the broken screen.

title: Rewards for v3 liquidity providers
description:
Minds Android app currently opens Uniswap V3 liquidity pool by default for earning option.

I've added to this liquidity on two separate occasions; however, I only seem to receive on-chain rewards for my v2 liquidity.

Is this by design for v3 liquidity providers to not receive the Off-chain rewards or will this issue be remedied in the future? Thanks!

title: Uniqueness check returns blank screen
description:
### Summary

After confirming phone number for channel uniqueness, I am met with this following screen:
![0cde5d6f-b6f2-47ec-8a7b-25271ac2600c](/uploads/97ab24994a0953425e2f94b68011e698/0cde5d6f-b6f2-47ec-8a7b-25271ac2600c.jpeg)

I'm told by Ben that this has not prevented me from completing the uniqueness check, but an end user may not be able to make this assessment.

### Steps to reproduce

Create new channel, verify channel via email, and then verify phone number to complete uniqueness check. Enter the code sent by SMS and this will be the result.

### Platform information 

Samsung Galaxy Note 10, Android 12

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

See attached image

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

(What you should see instead)

title: Translating a post crashes the app after fresh install
description:
### Summary

Do a clean installation of the app and translate a post -> crashes the app. 

### Steps to reproduce

1. Delete app.
2. Install app.
3. Login successfully. 
4. Navigate to a post.
5. Open menu and hit translate. 
6. App Crashes

### Platform information 

iOS - iPhone 11 Pro - iOS 15.0.1

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

Translating a post crashes app. 

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

Translation languages menu should appear.

### Relevant logs and/or screenshots

title: Wrong toaster message appears after completing rewards onboarding in app
description:
<!---
Please read this!

Before opening a new issue, make sure to search for keywords in the issues
filtered by the "T - Bug" label and verify the issue you're about to submit isn't a duplicate.
--->

### Summary

The toaster message that's displayed after a user completes rewards onboarding steps doesn't make sense.

### Steps to reproduce

- Launch the mobile app
- Create a new account
- Use the "Complete to earn tokens" checklist to fulfill all requirements for rewards

### Platform information 

- iOS 15.3.x
- Minds v4.22.0

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

Upon completion of the rewards onboarding steps, the user is brought to the newsfeed with a toaster message that reads:

> Your feed should be livelier!

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

The toaster should read something relevant to completing the onboarding steps.

### Relevant logs and/or screenshots

![image](/uploads/a6a843d98941b8baf0bd173a34e18785/image.png)

### Possible fixes

If we already have a relevant string defined, we can use that. Otherwise, we can use this string:

> You've joined rewards!

description: See attached ![F6A2AD2B-EA98-484B-9F30-0B3FF92646AA](/uploads/f7beb94a2e5bfe4463bf971b8540b341/F6A2AD2B-EA98-484B-9F30-0B3FF92646AA.png)

title: Clearing filter on posts in groups not available on iOS app
description:
Original report:

> Firstly thanks for the ability to filter posts in groups again. It’s much appreciated. 
> 
> I don’t see the option to remove the filter though on my iPhone 12 Pro running 15.3.1. It’s more of an issue because the filter is static. I like the static results while focus is in the group but I’d like to suggest a ‘remove filter’ option in the search box once applied. Also if you leave the group the filter should be wiped. The user could click the box and the option would be the default. That way the results could stay static plus the option to change filter or remove filter would always be present while not requiring any additional screen real estate.

The issue is that we are not clearing the filter when leaving the screen. 

### Test considerations

 - Open a group and search for something
 - Go back and open a different group
 - The search field shouldn't be open and it should be empty

Thanks
Fretz![EBA58B14-0A91-4F58-B41F-5DCE0FD67F3E](/uploads/eccda40fa489fb33a59b2debced328e6/EBA58B14-0A91-4F58-B41F-5DCE0FD67F3E.png)

![105A4406-5A55-4A92-80EC-CC05F5727782](/uploads/7f6b8f1336f60f13870c94d57ff04ca9/105A4406-5A55-4A92-80EC-CC05F5727782.png)

title: Blank Channel Recommendations See More page
description:
### Summary

See More Channel Recommendations is empty for a new registered user

### Steps to reproduce

1. Register as a brand new user on Minds Mobile app. 
2. Navigate to Channel Recommendations on Home page. 
3. Tap on See More button. 
4. Notice that the page is empty. 

### Platform information 

v4.22
iOS & Android
user: tanyatest71

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

Page is empty. 

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

Page should load successfully with subscription recommendations or no more recommendations message. 

### Relevant logs and/or screenshots

![image](/uploads/f539d54a4cbe99a56111f9bdedab8a75/image.png)

Check is user has more recommendations, if not, show a message that no more recommendations exists. 
If use has more recommendations, then show those recommendations. 
In both cases, this is a bug.

title: onViewableItemsChanged event is unreliable
description:
### Summary
onViewableItemsChanged event is not fired when viewing a post. This affects the view count and the functionality of the Top feed

### Steps to reproduce

* Check that the empty component is shown as expected
* Check that the seen posts are disappearing from the TOP feed when reloading

### Platform information 
Both

title: FeedList doesn't show the EmptyList when prepending a component
description:
### Summary

The FeedList component is now showing the Empty list component if pretend has a value

This is caused because we prepend a null value to the array to prevent the prepend component to be unmounted when the list is empty

title: Newsfeed keeps the TOP mode when switching users
description:
### Summary

When switching users the feed keeps the top/latest option, this is causing an issue due that the feature is behind an experiment. For instance: Having the Top feed activated in a user and switching to a user that has the FF in `false` will cause that user to only see the top feed contact and he will be unable to change to the latest feed. 

Also, one of the feeds are not reset when switching

### Steps to reproduce

- Activate TOP
- Switch to a user that has the FF in false
- You now are unable to change the feed to `latest`

title: Remove spaces on channels descritions in the channel recomendation component
description:
### Summary

In case the channel descriptions start with some empty lines it will break the layout of the feed's channel suggestion component


### Relevant logs and/or screenshots

(If you can, link to the line of code that might be responsible for the problem)

title: Check the feasibility of using the Noifee library for mobile
description:
<!---
Please read this!

Before opening a new issue, make sure to search for keywords in the issues
filtered by the "T - Bug" label and verify the issue you're about to submit isn't a duplicate.
--->

### Summary
This library appears to be a lot better than the current one we are using. https://notifee.app

It supports handling background notifications from JS without the need for custom native code, actions, text inputs. It can be integrated with FCM and OneSignal.

title: onViewedItemsChange even is not fired on the newsfeed when TOP is activated
description:
### Summary

The onViewedItemsChange event is not fired at all by the FlatList when the TOP feed is active. This not only prevents recording the view events of the posts but also affect the TOP feed functionality (because it depends on viewed content to filter the posts)

### Platform information 

iOS

title: Check if we can enable the split screen support on Android without losing the session
description:
### Summary

Due to a react-native issue the session was lost every time the split-screen mode was activated (The react native app restarted)

We should check if this issue was fixed in RN and enable it again in that case

### Steps to reproduce

(How one can reproduce the issue - this is very important)

### Platform information 

Android

description:
<!---
Please read this!

Before opening a new issue, make sure to search for keywords in the issues

if a person goes to delete a remind and they click "delete" in the menu, they receive a very vague error message.

Message should instead read "to delete a remind please click "undo remind"" or better yet, not have the option to delete when the post is a remind.

remind a post, 
go to post on timeline, 
click the drop down, 
click delete

### Platform information 
iphone

title: Password recovery flow: Logging in with new credentials fails
description:
<!---
Please read this!

Before opening a new issue, make sure to search for keywords in the issues
filtered by the "T - Bug" label and verify the issue you're about to submit isn't a duplicate.
--->

### Summary

During password recovery process on the mobile app, the last step displays a toaster messaging `Logging in with new credentials`. This toaster disappears and the user is left on the splash landing screen.

### Steps to reproduce

- Launch the mobile app
- Go through password recovery steps to reset the password
- After resetting the password, observe the toaster message

### Platform information 

iPhone 12 Mini, iOS 15.3, Minds ver 4.21.1 (Testflight)

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

- The toaster message indicates the user is being logged in
- The user is not logged in

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

- The user is logged in and brought to the newsfeed

### Relevant logs and/or screenshots

![image](/uploads/a9c338387acba6da3fb11a72c6bfb7e3/image.png)

title: Top/Latest feed is repeating posts on mobile
description:

Posts are repeated on mobile in some cases for the TOP feed. We need to check if it is a backend or a client issue

### Steps to reproduce
Open TOP feed, refresh and restart the app until repeated post appears

both

(If you can, link to the line of code that might be responsible for the problem)

title: Hyperlinks not working in channel “about section”
description:
Link to groups are not working on channel's description on both platforms

Probably a route issue that is also causing #4109

title: Update reanimated to 2.4.1
description:
### Summary
Update react-native-reanimated, it contains mostly bug fixing

title: Investigate the best/smallest intl polyfil for iOS
description:
### Summary
The INTL is not working on iOS, the Hermes engine implementation only works on Android. We need to look for a polyfill for it. 

Ideally it should be a small one with the features we need (Full implementations usually have 6mb of code)

https://gitlab.com/minds/mobile-native/-/issues/4099

### Steps to reproduce

`toLocaleString` of a number is not working on iOS. 

### Platform information 

iOS

2. Navigate to Settings -> Billing.
3. Notice that on iOS, the page is empty with no options available. And on Android, the options available are not clickable.

all iOS & Android mobile app
**Build Number** - v4.21.1

Android: ![image](/uploads/76269b0008fd895e34c279b7ff4e1e4b/image.png)

title: Video uploads are slow / never complete
description:
<!---
Please read this!

Before opening a new issue, make sure to search for keywords in the issues
filtered by the "T - Bug" label and verify the issue you're about to submit isn't a duplicate.
--->

### Summary

When posting a video from the mobile app on a 5G connection, the upload never completes.

### Steps to reproduce

From the mobile app, post a video (either from the camera roll, or by recording a new video). Complete the post and hit the paper airplane icon to send the post.

### Platform information 

iPhone app, iPhone 12 Mini, iOS 15.3.1

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

The app shows an animated loading indicator above the video in the post composer, and appears to indefinitely try to load the video. The upload never completes.

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

Either (a) the upload completes quickly, or (b) the loading indicator accurately reflects progress so that the user knows it's working. I can't tell if it's working and I'm too impatient, or if it just hangs.

### Next Steps
- try to upload same video on both web mobile and RN mobile app over 4/5G and measure the difference
-

title: Save video to user's device after recording
description:
When a user records a video in the app, we should save a copy of the video to the user's device before uploading it so that if the video upload fails, the video is not lost entirely.

- Save the video locally after the user confirms it

title: Video sleeps in the middle of a recording
description:
<!---
Please read this!

Before opening a new issue, make sure to search for keywords in the issues
filtered by the "T - Bug" label and verify the issue you're about to submit isn't a duplicate.
--->

### Summary

When recording a video in the mobile app, the device may go to sleep in the middle of recording.

### Steps to reproduce

Using the mobile app, launch the activity post composer and post a new video recording. Start recording and let the recording run for longer than the device's screen sleep timeout .

### Platform information 

iPhone app, iPhone 12 Mini, iOS 15.3.1

I believe Tanya also confirmed this behavior on Android.

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

On iPhone:
- The screen goes to sleep and the user can't see what they're recording.

On Android:
- The screen goes to sleep and the recording is stopped.

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

The screen should not go to sleep while the app is recording.

### Possible fixes

Prevent the device from going to sleep while the camera is open.

title: Pagination broken on feed component
description:
### Summary
Pagination is broken on FeedList component, it is a regression in the current dev branch 

### Steps to reproduce

Scroll to reach the end of the first page, it is not loading the next one

### Platform information 

both

### Possible fixes

Seems to be caused by the <SafeAreaInsetsContext.Consumer>

title: (bug) Can't share post

Share button is misbehaving on phone.

2. Click share button, then share
3. Nothing happens

Video:

title: Issue loading and displaying stories in the newsfeed
description:
This is an issue I've seen for some time already on iOS. It relates to the inconsistent fetching of stories in the newsfeed.

### Platform 

App 4.21.1 / iOS 15.1.1

### Background
This issue happens only when accessing the newsfeed after not having used in the app in some time.

* In this case, I viewed launched the app this morning, after not having used it in maybe 24 hrs.
* The stories are slow to load. Seeing pulsating circles for around 4-5 seconds
* After fetching has stopped, only the Minds account story is visible.
* If I then pull to fresh again, everything displays as usual.
* If I close the app, relaunch it afterwards, it functionals as normal. Seems to only happen after not having used the app in some time. Perhaps after cache has expired...

### Supporting screenshots

<details><summary>Launching app after having not used it in some time.</summary>
![IMG_1807](/uploads/a1c4b3297b37a92d38ed1d851075ffe2/IMG_1807.PNG)
![IMG_1808](/uploads/d1aa116a14930375184102e749c6696e/IMG_1808.PNG)
</details>

<details><summary>After pulling to refresh the feed</summary>
![IMG_1809](/uploads/777c54f78e0eb5d41bbbc2e84b213de5/IMG_1809.PNG)
</details>

cc/ @manishoo @msantang78

title: Implement channel recommendations within channel screen [ mobile 📱 ]
description:
Original web issue, please see -> https://gitlab.com/minds/minds/-/issues/2933

### Prototypes
- Freshly subscribed channel -> https://www.figma.com/proto/iFtbrfoK1BUvybYMHgFHuX/Recommendations-%5BMobile%5D?page-id=0%3A1&node-id=5%3A1128&viewport=241%2C48%2C1&scaling=scale-down&starting-point-node-id=5%3A1128&show-proto-sidebar=1

- Empty channel feed -> https://www.figma.com/proto/iFtbrfoK1BUvybYMHgFHuX/Recommendations-%5BMobile%5D?page-id=0%3A1&node-id=113%3A898&viewport=241%2C48%2C1&scaling=scale-down&starting-point-node-id=113%3A898&show-proto-sidebar=1

The above two cases are the only current scenarios for in-channel, channel recommendations.

title: Add intellisense and types to i18n and update typescript
description:
this will help us know if we mistyped an `i18n.t` or if some translation didn't exist in compile time

some examples:
https://stackoverflow.com/a/58308279/5607525
